dict.string: StudentCompanion needs access to your calendars to display your events alongside your academic schedule, helping you manage your time effectively.
StudentCompanion needs access to your reminders to integrate your tasks and academic deadlines, keeping everything organized in one place.
StudentCompanion needs to add events to your calendar to help you manage your academic schedule.
StudentCompanion needs full access to your calendars to display and manage your events alongside your academic schedule, helping you manage your time effectively.
StudentCompanion needs full access to your reminders to integrate and manage your tasks and academic deadlines, keeping everything organized in one place.
